commandDescription.en-US: Sends this content with these attachments or edits this message with them in this channel
commandDescription.fr: Envoie ce contenu avec ces pièces jointes ou modifie ce message avec ceux-là dans ce salon
commandDescription.pt-BR: Envia o conteúdo com esses anexos ou edita a mensagem com eles nesse canal

postSubCommandDescription.en-US: Sends this content in this channel
postSubCommandDescription.fr: Envoie ce contenu dans ce salon
postSubCommandDescription.pt-BR: Envia esse conteúdo pra esse canal

patchSubCommandDescription.en-US: Edits this message with this content in this channel
patchSubCommandDescription.fr: Modifie ce message avec ce contenu dans ce salon
patchSubCommandDescription.pt-BR: Edita a mensagem com esse conteúdo nesse canal

attachSubCommandDescription.en-US: Adds at this position this attachment to this message in this channel
attachSubCommandDescription.fr: Ajoute à cette position cette pièce jointe à ce message dans ce salon
attachSubCommandDescription.pt-BR: Adiciona esse anexo nessa posição pra essa mensagem nesse canal

detachSubCommandDescription.en-US: Removes at this position the attachment from this message in this channel
detachSubCommandDescription.fr: Retire à cette position la pièce jointe de ce message dans ce salon
detachSubCommandDescription.pt-BR: Remove o anexo nessa posição dessa mensagem nesse canal

attachHelp.en-US: Type $<attachSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription> $<positionOptionDescription> $<attachmentOptionDescription>` to add at `$<positionOptionDescription>` `$<attachmentOptionDescription>` to `$<messageOptionDescription>` in `$<channelOptionDescription>`
attachHelp.fr: Tape $<attachSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription> $<positionOptionDescription> $<attachmentOptionDescription>` pour ajouter à `$<positionOptionDescription>` `$<attachmentOptionDescription>` à `$<messageOptionDescription>` dans `$<channelOptionDescription>`
attachHelp.pt-BR: Digite $<attachSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription> $<positionOptionDescription> $<attachmentOptionDescription>` pra adicionar em `$<positionOptionDescription>` `$<attachmentOptionDescription>` pra `$<messageOptionDescription>` em `$<channelOptionDescription>`

detachHelp.en-US: Type $<detachSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription> $<positionOptionDescription>` to remove at `$<positionOptionDescription>` the attachment of `$<messageOptionDescription>` in `$<channelOptionDescription>`
detachHelp.fr: Tape $<detachSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription> $<positionOptionDescription>` pour retirer à `$<positionOptionDescription>` la pièce jointe d'`$<messageOptionDescription>` dans `$<channelOptionDescription>`
detachHelp.pt-BR: Digite $<detachSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription> $<positionOptionDescription>` pra remover em `$<positionOptionDescription>` o anexo de `$<messageOptionDescription>` em `$<channelOptionDescription>`

noChannelReply.en-US: I do not know any channel with this tag.
noChannelReply.fr: Je ne connais aucun salon avec cette étiquette.
noChannelReply.pt-BR: Não conheço nenhum canal com essa marcação.

noMessageReply.en-US: I do not know any message with this identifier in this channel.
noMessageReply.fr: Je ne connais aucun message avec cet identifiant dans ce salon.
noMessageReply.pt-BR: Não sei nenhuma mensagem com essa identificação nesse canal.

noPositionReply.en-US:
I do not know any slot with this position.
Please give me a position between `0` and `$<max>` instead.
noPositionReply.fr:
Je ne connais aucun emplacement avec cette position.
Merci de me donner une position entre `0` et `$<max>` à la place.
noPositionReply.pt-BR:
Não sei nenhum espaço com essa posição.
Por favor, me dê uma posição entre `0` e `$<max>` em vez disso.

noInteractionReply.en-US: I can not edit interaction replies or follow-ups.
noInteractionReply.fr: Je ne peux pas modifier de réponses ou de suites aux interactions.
noInteractionReply.pt-BR: Eu não posso editar respostas de interação ou acompanhamentos.

noContentOrAttachmentReply.en-US: Please keep a content or attachments.
noContentOrAttachmentReply.fr: Merci de garder un contenu ou des pièces jointes.
noContentOrAttachmentReply.pt-BR: Por favor, mantenha um conteúdo ou anexos.

noPatchPermissionReply.en-US: I do not have the rights to edit this message.
noPatchPermissionReply.fr: Je n'ai pas les droits pour modifier ce message.
noPatchPermissionReply.pt-BR: Eu não tenho as permissões pra editar essa mensagem.

noPostPermissionReply.en-US: I do not have the rights to send this message.
noPostPermissionReply.fr: Je n'ai pas les droits pour envoyer ce message.
noPostPermissionReply.pt-BR: Eu não tenho as permissões pra enviar essa mensagem.
